MAN.TITLE: gettext
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: get text translated into the current locale.

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : with tag = a string id. example 'my_tag_1'

DESCRIPTION.P: gettext get text associated to a tag (localization).

MAN.EXAMPLE: addtext('messages','my_tag_3','viva el scilab') addtext('messages',['my_tag_1','my_tag_2'],['my message in scilab','hello scilab']) gettext('messages','my_tag_2') gettext('messages','my_tag_1') [TAGS_MSG,STRINGS_MGS]=gettext('messages') [TAGS_ERR,STRINGS_ERR]=gettext('errors') [TAGS_MNU,STRINGS_MNU]=gettext('menus')
